page.title: 01TRANSPORT
page.content: {1 In the village there is a bus that comes every hour from Cradley to Worcester .To get to Hereford you have to go to Ledbury.And in the village there is an old halt at Newland East signal box but it is not there now because it has been demolished about 5 years ago. THere is a haulage yard, whose lorries transportfruit,and other trade vehicles and cars and there is an old gypsy caravan at the wheelwright's shop.Newland signal box is more than 100 years old at the moment. .It opens at 6 o'clock and it closes at 10.20 pm when the last train goes throught.Its used to stay open all night.About 55 trains come past a day it.On Sundays it opens at 9 o'clock,but when there is work being done it opens at 7 o'clock.
